attributes.action: Take ‘13 Reasons Why’ down from Netflix.
attributes.additional_details: Both of the Netflix seasons 1 and 2 of ‘13 Reasons Why’ are extremely graffic and bring the wrong kind of attention to a daily struggle for the modern day society.
attributes.background: 13 reasons why has brought sensitive modern day issues ,which are hard enough to deal with, into the light of fashion. Enabling young children to view and idolise characters who take “wrong actions” to deal with serious crisis matters.

rejection.details: This is the responsibility of Netflix, not the UK Government or Parliament.
